thread.content: Hello, a friend if mine has been diagnosed with depression after having an episode of lock jaw. He has c/o muscle spasm in his back and neck. I noticed that someone else on this forum experienced the same ss in 2009 and wondered if they were ever treated for it or diagnosed with anything
thread.author: V0calmom

thread.content: Everyone responds to a physical trauma differently. Your friend needs to be assessed for his degree of real depression. If it is mild to moderate he can be treated with supplements to augment brain chemicals. If severe, he probably would need anti-depressants which are sometimes pain modulators. A good evaluation is in order. Best, Dr.Kim
thread.author: Dr. Kim Crawford
